column4: i`m installing flight6 to my laptop. but grub couldn`t install. expresso returns error. filesystem is installed but i must install grub.. i can`t do it.. how can i fix/install my grub..
my disk name is hda but grub-install or sfsdisk --list /dev/hda is returns errors.
i have mount my root partition & chrooted. i try to run grub-install but it not worked :(
